articles.title: ‘Star Trek’-inspired Connecticut home is listed for $1.4 million
summary: A 'Star Trek'-inspired home in Connecticut is on the market for $1.4 million.
The listing agent believes a unique buyer is needed for this property.
The news was first reported on Boston.com.

articles.title: On a night described as a ‘gut punch,’ resilient Red Sox keep on fighting
summary: Resilient Red Sox persevere despite setbacks
